name: combine_strings
description: This tool concatenates two strings provided as param1 and param2 and returns the combined result.
parameters: {"type": "object", "properties": {"param1": {"type": "string", "description": "The first string to concatenate."}, "param2": {"type": "string", "description": "The second string to concatenate."}}, "required": ["param1", "param2"]}
